name: Ladakh Tour By Air (16th – 22nd June 2014)
description:
Overview
A unique Ladakh tour that takes you to the heart of Buddhist ladkah to witness mother nature up close and personal. This Ladakh tour makes you cross the highest motorable roads on earth, camp right beside the Pangong Lake as you soak every bit of the serene beauty in your heart. Life indeed is great…!!!
Places Covered: Leh, Pangong Tso, Nubra Valley
